title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc" and set the default value to "aa". Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa". Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. [Add steps here to reproduce the issue.]
